text:
The Global Engagement Office has managed the Student-initiated Projects (SIP) funding scheme since 2013-14. With the support of university funds, various SIP activities have successfully promoted campus internationalisation and student integration.
ğŸ“£ The Student-initiated Projects (SIP) funding scheme is calling for proposals!
If you have brilliant ideas that can promote intercultural understanding, global perspective and multi-cultural integration among students, SIP is the perfect funding opportunity for you. Get ready to make waves with your innovative ideas!
The maximum sponsorship amount for an approved proposal may reach HK$100,000. SIP organisers who successfully complete their projects will be awarded a certificate. Donâ€™t miss out on this golden opportunity! âœ¨
ğŸ“ Donâ€™t delay, unleash your ideas and submit your proposal to sip.geo@cityu.edu.hk NOW!
More information: www.cityu.edu.hk/geo/international-campus/sip
Enquiry
Global Engagement Office
Email: sip.geo@cityu.edu.hk
Disclaimer: This email (including any attachments) is for the use of the intended recipient only and may contain confidential information and/or copyright material. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately and delete this email and all copies from your system. Any unauthorized use, disclosure, reproduction, copying, distribution, or other form of unauthorized dissemination of the contents is expressly prohibited.
